sentences.english: The first use of cemented fragmental rock filling in China was conducted atTongkeng tin mine operated by Dachang Mine Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 大廠銅坑錫礦在國內率先使用塊石砂漿膠結充填法。

sentences.english: Silicified limestone is extensively developed in the Xikuangshan antimony deposit.
sentences.chinese: 錫礦山銻礦硅化灰巖發育廣泛。

sentences.english: Chlorite in Furong tin allotment can be divided into two stages of mineralization.
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉錫礦田中的綠泥石可分爲兩個礦化階段。

sentences.english: The Tin ore resource is the one of minerals of superiority and strategy in our country.
sentences.chinese: 錫礦資源是我國具有戰略意義的優勢礦種之一。

sentences.english: Not only is rich, and tin reserves to open mining.
sentences.chinese: 錫礦儲藏量不但豐富，而且易於露天開採。

sentences.english: In addition to cassiterite and stannite, galena also contains a high amount of tin.
sentences.chinese: 除錫石和黃錫礦外，方鉛礦也含有較高的錫。

sentences.english: The mineralization of cassiterite-quartz vein is the main type of tin deposit in this district.
sentences.chinese: 提出錫石石英脈型礦化爲本區主要錫礦類型。

sentences.english: Tears in the tin beginning ryukyu lakefront of female life.
sentences.chinese: 秋菊在錫礦開端了琉琅女的生活。

sentences.english: The Laochang Tin Mine is the mainstay of China' Tin Base Yunnan Tin Industry Corp.
sentences.chinese: 老廠錫礦是中國最大錫都雲南錫業公司的支柱礦山。
